content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards as a greedy landlord, so I am always seeking the highest possible price. Therefore, I would rate my satisfaction as a 10.
name: Peter Schmidt
